website_summaries.verdict: An attractive addition to any garden. We particularly love how this fountain doubles as a planter.
pros: Fountain can be used indoors or out
Features a built-in area to hold a plant or cuttings

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous fountain
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful and peaceful. I put this out on my screen in porch and I lay in my hammock and just relax. The sound of the water running through the fountain is so relaxing. I’m spending so much more time out on the porch now. Sometimes I let my birds loose on the porch, they love taking a little bath in it.
customer_reviews.author: Ann M Heinly

customer_reviews.title: Cascading fountain old water pump
customer_reviews.text: I love these fountains! I have two. Everyone that sees them wants to know where I got them👍😊
customer_reviews.author: georgedennis

customer_reviews.title: Love my fountain...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little fountain. I’ve had it since April and no problems at all. Obviously you can’t just plug it in and never deal with it. You have to do some maintenance...fill it when it gets low, water evaporates quickly in the hot summer and pull the pump out and clean the gunk off of the grill every couple of weeks. Easy. I put some river rocks in the barrels and put a few drops of algae killer in whenever I fill or change the water. Lovey addition to my deck.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: This fountain is awesome. Just open the box attach the pump add ...
customer_reviews.text: This fountain is awesome. Just open the box attach the pump add water and plug in to enjoy. We added the plant and some decorative rocks and set on top of a barrel planter for a little more height. Looks great! I love sitting on my deck and enjoying with a glass of wine.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit, molding quality could be better.
customer_reviews.text: This fountain is good size, looks nice and the birds love it. My only suggestion is what others said, the quality of the pump and base should be inspected and the resin flash cleaned up so you can twist to install the pump. My unit was so hard to twist on that I needed to chip away some resin and by doing so, (the pump body is so thin), it cracked a hole in it, so I had to epoxy and repair it. My only suggestion.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Looks and sounds really nice.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this addition to our outdoor patio. It looks and sounds nice. I bought a cheap, fake plant for the planter as I didn’t want to be bothered trying to keep a real plant alive. One note, the hole in the back for the pump is pretty large I would not recommend this product unless the back will be up against a wall of some sort.
customer_reviews.author: MK78

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: When I first purchased this fountain, I loved it. I was a bit disappointed with the plastic look, but it was still pretty and sounded lovely. Three months later the paint had peeled off the inside of the buckets. So now I have a somewhat white fountain. Ok we could live with that. Despite regular maintainance, the pump died. So after six months, I'm in search of a new fountain that isn't so poorly made. Pros: Cute to start with, price point. Cons: paint peels, pump stops running, little planter feature too small. No longevity. Lasted 6 months total. Recommend: NO. SAVE YOUR MONEY AND BUY ONE IN PERSON, SO YOU KNOW WHAT YOU'RE GETTING.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Gstettenbauer

customer_reviews.title: Great fountain
customer_reviews.text: I love this ! Birds like to take a bath in it
customer_reviews.author: Debbra Steffes

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy We Love It!
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived right on time and took no time at all to assemble. Started working the minute we filled with water and plugged it in. I have it in a small screen porch and would like to be able to change it to run a little slower but having company yesterday and light talking it faded perfectly into the background. Love the touch of adding a little greenery to it too. I purchased a small plant of ivy and it was a hit! You will not be disappointed with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: John Prewitt

customer_reviews.title: Great value and function.
customer_reviews.text: Loved as a gift. Works well. Has not lost any flow through three months of use. Nicer looking in person.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up! Read my positive review.
customer_reviews.text: Great decorative water fountain! (I would strongly recommend this to be used indoors, however if you decide to use it outdoors, make sure it is place on a cover area like a porch or a patio, and not left to be directly exposed to the elements.) A small succulent plant pairs well with this product. I have no real complaints about this product. It looks beautiful, it sounds beautiful, and it works beautifully. If I had to criticize it, I would state the obvious, the brick is fake, the metal is fake, and the wood is fake. However it's constructed well and doesn't look cheap or too fake.
customer_reviews.author: M. Miguel Clark

customer_reviews.title: Nice and works very well, but a BIG open hole in the back.
customer_reviews.text: It is nice and works well, but there is a BIG open hole in the back (where you put the pump in) and no cover for it , so I made one out of a rubber out door floor mat. if you don't cover that opening up it will fill up with debris and bugs.
customer_reviews.author: PTL

customer_reviews.title: poor quality, casting is very very thin and brittlle .
customer_reviews.text: item was rec'd very broken . going to return .
customer_reviews.author: Fred R. Hermann

customer_reviews.title: Stress instead of Serenity
customer_reviews.text: product would not assemble correctly. Could not get the spigot to go over the right barrel so water can flow from top to bottom. Instead it would only click in when the spigot was over the middle of the fountain which created a loud water faucet sound. Not calming at all. Then within minutes, it started to leak badly and not just water, the paint was also coming off on my hands and all over the tiles in my patio. What should have assembled easily in minutes, created this big mess that took awhile to clean up. Then I had the joy of boxing it up and returning it.
customer_reviews.author: leep

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Hold Up
customer_reviews.text: We were able to use this for a summer and it was really pretty! Unfortunately we plugged it in for the first time this season and there is a HUGE crack in the bottom. Such a disappointment! :-(
customer_reviews.author: Shawn K.

customer_reviews.title: Top part won't attach properly!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this pump but when I put the top part on it, the way it is lining up would make the water pour out into the planter instead of in the little "bucket" things. It's completely worthless! It also looks like the top was broken and glued back together. Total piece of garbage and now I have to try to figure out how to return it during this shelter-in-place. Thanks a lot, Amazon, for selling me such a piece of crap as there is NO WAY to make this thing work in the condition it was sent to me in.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Y.

customer_reviews.title: This is the third one we bought...
customer_reviews.text: After the first one we tried other water fountains but they all seemed to have a problem, the biggest is the birds did not like them. For some reason the local birds (from crows to hummingbirds) like this water fountain. So when this one goes belly up, we will get another just like it. I have to add water every other day. Not sure where it goes, maybe splashes or evaporation but regardless it always seems to need water added to it. That is my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Hermit

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but does not work well.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute fountain and very easy to assemble. It looks adorable on my deck with some pots around it. It starts out with good water pressure when first plugged in but over time it becomes a dribble. The pump should be stronger. I keep it filled with water as required but the amount of water does not make a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi14

customer_reviews.title: Sounds pretty.
customer_reviews.text: Not exactly what I expected however it was purchased as a gift and she loves it. It leaks a bit from the top inside of the pump handle and I couldn't find a way to fix it. Other than that it's really nice and fits perfectly where she wanted it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Looks decent, however, I don't expect the water ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks decent, however, I don't expect the water pump to last long. Not worth $133. Price point should be around $50-$60.
customer_reviews.author: Bruiser

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful little fountain
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a simple backyard fountain that I could assemble myself and this one is light enough that I can empty it and move it myself if I have to. It has been in use a few weeks and we love it. The colors are beautiful and so far there have been no problems with the pump.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B.

customer_reviews.title: Pump not durable
customer_reviews.text: Although the fountain looks nice, the sound of the water is not very loud. What's way worse though, is that the pump died in less than 6 weeks of use. Now I have to look for and buy a replacement, as I don't see a way to contact the seller anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Product is fine, packaging is lacking
customer_reviews.text: No complaints with the actual product but the top decorative handle was packaged in the underside of the top piece of Styrofoam by press fit only. It was not taped in place and when we lifted the top off (not knowing it was in the under side) the handle fell and cracked into many pieces. Reached out to the manufacturer for replacement. I even asked if I could purchase one. They responded a couple times but then stopped communication completely... So good luck if you ever need help with the product down the road.
customer_reviews.author: MAtt

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in March for my daughters bday and its already stopped working. Any ideas? I have cleaned it twice due to it slowing down and or stoppiing the water flow..Any suggestions before I return it?
customer_reviews.author: Laura F

customer_reviews.title: Nice flow!
customer_reviews.text: Loving this! I only use it when actually outside on the deck, to save my electricity bill. Im not sure how much it actually uses to keep it on not stop, but it's very nice to listen too. Great flow, little splash, and plenty to enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it but have gone through about 3 motors so far. Burns up fast.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin, H.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to assemble. The paint is peeling after 1 month of use.
customer_reviews.author: Michele A. Burke

customer_reviews.title: Excellent addition to any small garden
customer_reviews.text: Excellent addition to any small garden. Love the sound of the flowing water even provide a very small area to put a potted plant such as herbs or a vine. It’s plastic so I am sure of the color will fade over many years in the sun but overall this is an excellent fountain to add to your garden.
customer_reviews.author: IrishHippie

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: Overall I really like this fountain. I have it placed on my front porch. The only drawback is that the pump gets clogged up fairly easily with debris. I have to clean the intake on the pump at least every other day. If not, the water slows down to a trickle. Not sure if this is a design flaw or contaminants blowing into the fountain. Overall, very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Laher

customer_reviews.title: This pump is very nice. It's good looking
customer_reviews.text: This pump is very nice. It's good looking, tall (3-1/2 ft), doesn't splash water everywhere, sets up quickly and I really love it. It has a small cup built in to put a potted herb plant or whatever into it, which gives a little more flare. I'm glad I bought it and who ever buys it will be happy with it, too.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette DeLuca

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Great product came faster than predicted. Love looking at it every day. Its all I expected
customer_reviews.author: woody ward

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, very easily breakable it seems.... 🤷🏼‍♂️
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this item. Barely had it for over a month. Go to clean it and unscrew the top part to remove piping. The seal and pump immediately cracked. Of course, the warranty I purchased doesn’t cover the broken item so in the trash it will go. On to the next one. Only thing I didn’t like was the lack of any type of lighting in it but overall nice looking fountain.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Beale

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not even 2 months of use and the paint is coming off in the bowls the water falls into/through. Extremely disappointing. Such a neat looking waterfall. Too bad the quality isn't better. Very concerned about the durability and how log it will last. Return time has expired already. 😢
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: In love!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my fountain. I’ve had it up for 2 months now and it is a beautiful addition to the deck. My only complaint is, you have to pull the pump out and wipe the filter screen every few weeks or it get “clogged” up and the stream of water coming from the fountain is poor.
customer_reviews.author: Lesa

customer_reviews.title: great piece for the garden
customer_reviews.text: Received as promised ...great piece for the garden...worth the money..made well
customer_reviews.author: mindy browne

customer_reviews.title: nice fountain; the electric pump wasn't so great
customer_reviews.text: nice fountain; the electric pump wasn't so great, went out at about 1 month so, we had to go to Loews to purchase another one, otherwise it's ok.
customer_reviews.author: shirley w.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely in Every Way!
customer_reviews.text: Every once in awhile I get a WOW factor when receiving an item. Your always hopeful and this time my expectations were met in every way! This is a truly lovely fountain! I am waiting on the barrel so I can make it a bit higher. I am so in love with this fountain that I had to add my beloved sea turtle collection to its decor.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great little fountain .. but
customer_reviews.text: I truly do love this little fountain. It fits my little patio/ porch area great. I love the sounds of the water. . The reason I deducted a star is because it came broken in 4 different spots. Thankfully the parts that broke off were in the box so I was able to glue them back on.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Wadden

customer_reviews.title: I thought it would look like wood. But it's a good size and sounds ...
customer_reviews.text: The coloring on the base is a little funkier orange. I thought it would look like wood. But it's a good size and sounds nice. I like the plant holder option.
customer_reviews.author: BLf

customer_reviews.title: Design flaw
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed in my fountain. When I fill the water up the water would spill out the front, thus losing enough water to pump. It worked at first. Tried lifting it up, but it didn’t work. Really cute, but not working. I would now like to make an update. The place where you plant a flower or plant is right above where a drain is. I found dirt plugged in the hole. That made the water drain out incorrectly. I unplugged the hole and now it works again. When watering your plant watch that the dirt doesn’t plug the fountain.
customer_reviews.author: beverly bruns

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wife is love it and reasonable for the price. So far so good
customer_reviews.author: Anh N. Lam

customer_reviews.title: What are you waiting for?
customer_reviews.text: We love this fountain on the deck. It's lightweight and super easy to put together and running. It's not so loud you have to talk over it like some barrel fountains are. It's extremely soothing and relaxing. I would definitely recommend it to anyone! Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: AllaK

customer_reviews.title: Horrible warranty
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this in May, and it arrived quickly, and was beautiful. However, it broke down and quit working in less than 6 months. Amazon would not honor the year warranty, but instead only offered a 30 warranty. They directed us to the manufacturer but they would not help us since we bought it through Amazon. Had we bought it through them, they would have honored their 1 year warranty. Now we are stuck with a broken fountain. I would recommend you think twice about purchasing this through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Reinders

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fountain
customer_reviews.text: We really like this fountain and we bought a $12 pot that looks like a barrel at Home Depot to prop it up. It definitely needs some height to it. But we've enjoyed it very much
customer_reviews.author: Thomas T

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful form and function
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble (it was pretty much complete right out of the box). We put it on our outdoor deck to add a nice soft falling water sound. Looks and works great.
customer_reviews.author: ,john devine

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Fountain
customer_reviews.text: This fountain is beautiful and the serene sound of the water is the perfect touch for my deck!!! Love, love, love it! The only thing I did to alter the appearence was to dry brush some more color to the two upper pots...one a brick red and the other a golden yellow.,,very soft color. The key is to dry brush not to cover with paint.
customer_reviews.author: K. J.

customer_reviews.title: Peaceful Fountain
customer_reviews.text: I love my little fountain. It was a bit smaller than I was imagining, but, still fits in the space nicely. It was easy to assemble and we had blissful, bubbling noises quickly. The water flows nicely and makes a soothing noise as it tumbled over the barrels. There were no issues with shipping. I think I might get another one. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Alison C

customer_reviews.title: A Tranquil Touch
customer_reviews.text: We couldn’t be happier with the quality of craftsmanship provided by this beautiful fountain. It provides the perfect centerpiece of tranquility for our daughter’s memorial garden. Now I just need to add a cascading plant to complete the look!
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie K. Bess

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It came boxed well, and it is easy to assemble with a little patience . I have a solar pump running mine and I get a strong flow of water with no over splash. I put some artificial flowers in the little planter and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTED!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with this fountain! I purchased it in May of this year and the paint Is already chipping off, even places not exposed to water.. I payed a discounted price of at least $150.00.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Great little fountain
customer_reviews.text: I love this fountain...not too big...not too small. Has a nice sound without overwhelming me. Perfect for the location I wanted it in...in my patio room setting on top of my compact refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: Rick J. Rider

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice fountain. The running water is great and I do not notice the pump sound. I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Geri S

customer_reviews.title: Nice look and size for the money.
customer_reviews.text: We really like the look and calming sound with this fountain. The only complaint would be within a week a lot of the paint starting chipping off the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Box arrived really battered- not a good sign. The fountain was broken and had to return. Highly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: blkbeauty

customer_reviews.title: Love it, and so Does Everyone Else
customer_reviews.text: Really nice fountain. Looks great (so far) out on m deck. Does not spill water outside of the unit. Love the plant holder. I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: The center piece in our back yard, which is small. We are using a solar pump which is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Knowing I'm getting a quality product
customer_reviews.text: Love,Love,Love this fountain. Perfect size it's just great I would recommend this item to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great Value - Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Loved the beauty & quality of this well made waterfall! It works perfectly & has a full force waterfall sound. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Skogs

customer_reviews.title: Very serene...visually and sound-wise....
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful looking and sound also makes the seating area very serene. I am hoping it will hold up a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Ctozl

customer_reviews.title: As represented
customer_reviews.text: This arrived on time but damaged. I received another seperate package that was damaged also. Pretty sure it was our local post office as is norm with them. The fountain was as described and was very nice. Even tho we sent it back it was not their fault on damage. Their end was perfect. Receiving replacement soon!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: This fountain is adorable, but you can barely hear the water. I might look into getting a stronger pump. If you are looking for a cute fountain this is it, but if you are looking to hear water flowing, not so much.
customer_reviews.author: dmn

customer_reviews.title: stylish
customer_reviews.text: momma wanted this for the front porch, so momma got it. fill it up. plug it in, n relax
customer_reviews.author: AV8er

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: We liked this one so well that we bought a second one for another part of our yard.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t even come with the pump
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t even come with the pump. So basically useless. Seems cheaply made, but what can you expect for the price. Really disappointed I can’t even use it. Calling customer support tomorrow
customer_reviews.author: Christian E

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves it. It's been working well so far. Looks nice on the front entry.
customer_reviews.author: Stray Cat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fountain.
customer_reviews.text: Great water fountain in my wife's rock garden. Easy to assemble. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Paul C. Woodward

customer_reviews.title: Its smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: I love my fountain it's a little shorter than I expected. But I added a half wine barrel to add extra hight. It works perfectly you have to change them or add water every other week!
customer_reviews.author: Alisto39

customer_reviews.title: Very nice fountain
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying this fountain very much. It is exactly like it is shown in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn L. Matson

customer_reviews.title: Terrible service
customer_reviews.text: Nice fountain but was missing the pump. Seller impossible to reach. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Doug Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Pleased.
customer_reviews.text: I love the look. I just plugged it in today and it works fine. Tine will tell how long it last. But all in all I am happy with this product. It is very cute in design.
customer_reviews.author: mark 16:16

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I was so looking foward to my fountain but it arrived missing a pump and the cord😐😡
customer_reviews.author: Manuela

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: This water feature is exactly what I wanted! The size is perfect for my porch. It’s big enough where it can stand alone with out needing something under it. It was super easy to put together. The exterior is beautiful. I was worried it may look cheesy but it looks great! I was looking at a bunch of these and I’m so happy I chose this one!
customer_reviews.author: marc

customer_reviews.title: A lot of fun
customer_reviews.text: This is really a hit for my front yard, filling in a boring spot between two sidewalks. It is a unique item and well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Schafer

customer_reviews.title: Assembly issue
customer_reviews.text: Not great quality control. Matching surface for top unit had to be smoothed out for hand pump to lock in place. Otherwise good product for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Seara Romeo

customer_reviews.title: Stunning
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely stunning water fountain. It looks beautiful and give more accent to my little garden. I attached two little birds to it by crazy glue which looks more natural.
customer_reviews.author: AE

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this fountain
customer_reviews.text: No complaints. Looks nice, works great and has a pleasant sound. As advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Nice & easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: This replacement shipment product was in good condition, easy assembly & no leaks.
customer_reviews.author: JR171

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS FOUNTAIN!! This is the 3rd fountain I have had in my house. It is by far the best! No splatter, holds a lot of water and looks nice. It is a good weight. Not too loud, but loud enough. Easy access on the back also.
customer_reviews.author: luvshoes

customer_reviews.title: Cool fountain
customer_reviews.text: Really cool fountain for smaller spaces. Spot for a potted plant is a nice touch. Easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: rodney k gile

customer_reviews.title: Appearance and Performance were exactly what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, operates perfectly, requires little or no maintenance other that maintaining water level every 5-6 days (ours is less because of its placement in the shade. Looks great, and the soft sound of the cascading water is so restful. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: TorpedoBait

customer_reviews.title: Pump has given out!
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this fountain 7 months and the pump has already stopped working! Highly disappointed, I paid a lot of money for it too!!
customer_reviews.author: M Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this!! No assembly really just attach the pump. WORTH IT!!
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works great!
customer_reviews.text: It was a little smaller than I expected, but the base holds quite a bit and is enclosed so splashing and evaporation are minimized. I fill it far less than the larger one I replaced. And it's cute as can be!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Payne

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding sun room add on
customer_reviews.text: Received in perfect condition, easy assembly in less that half hour. Five gallons of water required. Set it up in my sun room the soothing water flow is wonderful to the ears. Recommend water conditioner for alege reduction. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Horacio Capella

customer_reviews.title: pump dosnt work
customer_reviews.text: pump didnt work big hole in side of box worked great for 4 days then stopped
customer_reviews.author: vera van stavern

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: It is as described, and works great! It also looks good in my yard!
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Happy buyer
customer_reviews.text: We loves this great little fountain. Nothing like the sound of running water on a hot day. Be sure to keep water in it. The water will evaporate a little more quickly than I thought.
customer_reviews.author: David Potter

customer_reviews.title: Great fountain!  Very Happy.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this little fountain. Looks great! Easy to set up and maintain. Looks great surrounded by plants.
customer_reviews.author: Brian W. Ralston

customer_reviews.title: noise
customer_reviews.text: i can barely hear the water, not happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This thing is horrible. Cheap
customer_reviews.text: This thing is horrible. Cheap, plastic junk. I cannot believe that I got suckered into spending over $130 for this! I missed the window to return it, because I was out of town, so I have to donate it. NO ONE would pay even $20 for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just really love my fountain
customer_reviews.text: Just really love my fountain. I bought LED fountain lights and put in 3 of the pots. So pretty at night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but not usable
customer_reviews.text: The gray pump piece has to be screw on to assemble it. When we did that the spout the water comes out of doesn't line up right. The water will either hit the pot that holds a flower or hits the ground, missing the cascading pots all together.
customer_reviews.author: AmyK

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend! Just the right sound!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this fountain. It is beautiful and the sound is not too loud and not too soft! I would highly recommend this to anyone looking to enhance their porch or lanai!
customer_reviews.author: Kcompt

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, great sound
customer_reviews.text: Pretty..has a strong flow. It has a place for a plant which is nice. I was disappointed it doesn’t have a light, but I just wrapped a string of lights around it.
customer_reviews.author: kalys

customer_reviews.title: love love love it
customer_reviews.text: love love love it. it looks so cute in my garden and I love the sounds of water falling. Perk: the birds love it too.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Roman

customer_reviews.title: Bought as gift
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected but otherwise very nice. Stepdaughter loves it
customer_reviews.author: Debbi Black

customer_reviews.title: Love the look and live plant space.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice water fountain. Bought this for the wife, she loves it. We put this on our back covered porch and enjoy the water cascade.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Jaggers

customer_reviews.title: Love this so much
customer_reviews.text: Love this so much. Very happy with this purchase. I was going back and forth between this one and another one that had led lights (and was more expensive). But got this one, and just ordered some submersible LED lights to put in it :)
customer_reviews.author: angelgrut

customer_reviews.title: Great fountain!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome fountain...love it...so relaxing to hear the water run! My only issue is that the paint is wearing off inside the water wells
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Santa Barbara

customer_reviews.title: We absolutely love this fountain
customer_reviews.text: I don't even notice the sound of the pump, just the gentle sound of water cascading down. We absolutely love this fountain!
customer_reviews.author: Janae Pickett

product_meta.title: Glenville Water Pump Cascading Water Fountain
product_meta.description:
The Glenville cascading fountain has a tiered water flow system which creates a peaceful ambiance. The simulated bricks and wood have been hand detailed for a unique yet replicated look. This fountain is a beauty in any backyard, patio or garden.


Features : * Durable polyresin & fiberglass construction
 * Pump included
 * Electric power
 * Output: 110v
 * Line Cord: 5 meters
 * Weatherproof
 * For outdoor/indoor use


Specifications : * Product Dimensions : 32" H x 15" W x 15" D
 * Product Weight : 22lbs
